snippet: Democratic leaders expressed alarm that George Soros’s $100 million plan to focus on grass-roots organizing would squander a chance to fend off an advertising onslaught from Republican groups.
abstract: Democratic leaders express alarm that George Soros’s $100 million plan to focus on grass-roots organizing would duplicate a similar effort Pres Obama's campaign and squander a chance to fend off an advertising onslaught from Republican groups.
lead_paragraph: Democratic leaders expressed alarm that George Soros’s $100 million plan to focus on grass-roots organizing would squander a chance to fend off an advertising onslaught from Republican groups.

headline.main: Liberal Donors’ Plan Worries Top Democrats
headline.print_headline: Liberal Donors’ Plan Worries Top Democrats
